data.persona: As Prince I know one day I will be King. Then I will rule MY way. I will be the best king of all.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Entrance.
The palace entrance is majestic and well built. There are beautiful decorations from all over the world from the greatest artists. It is mostly gold and pretty colors.
The noble and the queen are here.

You are carrying a Gold locket and a Locket, and wearing a garment and a Ring.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the Gold locket to the noble as a gift from our kingdom.
data.mid_motivation: I am meeting with a potential marriage partner with the queen, my mother, and I must make a good impression.
data.long_motivation: I am to getting prepared to get married so that my kingdom becomes stronger with new allies.
